unnormalised: Thoddi khobor! Tech Mahindra-chea tin mhoineaanchea boskent natak!
normalised: breaking news! tech mahindra-che quarterly meet-ant drama!

unnormalised: Tech Mahindra-chea tisrea timaanim'chea nikal divpachea karyakromant aiz thoddi masaledar gosht zali. Distta ki, Shri Sharma, zo nirantar tanant aslole "Associate VP of Strategic Alliances" (va jiko konn "The Spreadsheet Whisperer" mhonta), tannem chukun Shrimati Kapoor, ek novich utval "Director of Innovation and Blue-Sky Thinking" (jika "Ideas Cannon" mhuntat), tika "Director of Imitation and Slightly-Less-Cloudy Day Dreaming" mhunn vollokh dili. Chook zali!
normalised: tech mahindra-che Q-three results presentation-ant thode tikkhat zale. disllea pormanne, mister sharma, zo sodanch stressed-out "associate V-P of strategic alliances" (vo kaim zann taka "spreadsheet whisperer" mhunntat), tannem chukon miss kapoor, ji ekdom dhaddxi "director of innovation and blue-sky thinking" (a-k-a "ideas cannon"), hika "director of imitation and slightly-less-cloudy day dreaming" mhunn vollokh dili. oops!

unnormalised: Hi ghoddnnuk, tinn espresso ani eka halukea astitvatlea sanktatun utponn zali, hanne conference room-ant ek ajibat hasyeani ani nervas kasanche lahiri utponn keleo. Sakshidar mhuntat Shrimati Kapoor, je sadarponan prakash ani bandhach utsaht utponn kortat, hannem Shri Sharma-k ek drishti dili ji 50 pavlam pasun lassi dhait dhakhta. "Head of Corporate Synergy", Shri Iyer, hanne sadhe korunk prayatn kelo, punn tannem fuddem vaitt kelim, hi gost ek "emergent chaos-achem uttam udahoron" mhunn mhunnun, "eka shaant konntrant aplea jeevitatlea nirnayancher prashn vicharunk" bahana dila.
normalised: hi ghoddnuk, triple espresso ani eka mild existential crisis-an bhorl'li asli, hache vorvim conference room-ant eka awkward hasyeachi ani nervous khoklechi lahar utponn zali. sakshik sangtat ki miss kapoor, ji sadharonnponni uzvad ani disruptive urja dakhaita, mister sharma-k asa dishta dilem jem 50 pavlamvelhem lassi-ui fodddunk shaktem. "head of corporate synergy", mister iyer, hanni soglle thik korunk yotn kelo, punn fattim te "emergent chaos-achem perfect udahoron" mhunn sangon apnank "aplea jivitache choice-ancher prosn korpak ek shant konno sodunk" excuse korun gele.

unnormalised: Pun, sadarponan vyavsayik astana, Shrimati Kapoor-n tem sahansheelten ghetlem, mhunnun ki kadachit "nakal mhanje prasansa korpacho sachcho prakar, zali tari astana". Shri Sharma, tacho atmo povitr aso, tannem mafichi yachna keli ani "puryess caffeine nastana" mhunnun sangli. Share bazar, devachi daya, aprabhavit ravlo, dis Rs. 1250-ak band zala. Fuddlea velar konnen tori ealea vhoddlea boskant tachi coffee lipovpachi zaru.
normalised: punn, kednach professional asleli, miss kapoor-an tem sohan kelen, asa quipping korun ki "imitation ekdom satchi flattery zata, zalench tor tem accidental astolem". mister sharma-n, bhala asa tacho atmo, apli mafi magli ani hi chuk "insufficent caffeine levels" mhunn dile. stock price, dev bare karu, unaffected urlo, rupay ek hazar donso panchso rupean band zala. dusrea velar konne tori taka coffee sangun dovrunk zai hea vhoddlea meetings-ant.
